photos.title: Couple with Car
photos.description: Sit the couple on the back of a classic car, embracing and smiling. Capture the joyful moment with the car as a stylish backdrop.

photos.title: Sunset Embrace
photos.description: Position the couple in a field during sunset, embracing and looking into each other's eyes. Capture the warm and romantic atmosphere.

photos.title: Tender Hug
photos.description: Have the groom hug the bride from behind while she smiles. Capture the tenderness and joy in their expressions.

photos.title: Bride's Kiss
photos.description: Position the bride kissing the groom's cheek while he smiles. Capture the loving and playful interaction.

photos.title: Champagne Toast
photos.description: Photograph the couple through two champagne glasses with a beautiful landscape in the background. Capture the celebratory mood.

photos.title: Mountain Romance
photos.description: Position the couple by a mountain lake, the groom lifting the bride. Capture the scenic beauty and romantic moment.

photos.title: Sparkler Heart
photos.description: Have the couple stand inside a heart shape made with sparklers at night. Capture the magical and romantic scene.

photos.title: Jacket Hug
photos.description: Have the groom hug the bride from behind, wrapping her in his jacket. Capture the warmth and comfort of the embrace.

photos.title: Beach Walk
photos.description: Photograph the couple walking hand in hand along the beach. Capture the peaceful and romantic atmosphere.

photos.title: Heart Hands
photos.description: Have the couple form a heart shape with their hands in front of them. Capture the close-up of the hands and the symbolic gesture.
